滴水不漏.definition: lit. not one drop of water can leak out; watertight; rigorous (argument)

滴水不羼.definition: not diluted by one drop; hundred percent

滴水石穿.definition: dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success; You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up.; Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.

滴水穿石.definition: dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success; You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up.; Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.

滴注.definition: to drip into; to transfuse; to percolate; to drip feed; fig. to instill

滴溜溜.definition: whirling; spinning around and around; round and plump (e.g. of fruit)

滴滴.definition: DiDi, app-based transportation company (abbr. for 滴滴出行[Di1 di1 Chu1 xing2])

滴滴出行.definition: Didi Chuxing Technology Co., aka DiDi, app-based transportation company, headquartered in Beijing, founded in 2012

滴答.definition: (onom.) pattering sound; drip drip (of water); tick tock (of clock); also pr. [di1 da5]

滴管.definition: intravenous drip tube; dropper; eyedropper; (coll.) pipette; (coll.) burette; drip-irrigation pipe (abbr. for 滴灌管[di1guan4guan3])

滴道.definition: Didao district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang

滴道區.definition: Didao district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang

滴酒不沾.definition: never to touch a drop of alcohol

滴里耷拉.definition: hanging down loosely; dangling in disorder
